    add(Staff) - Static method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.StaffContainer
    Adds a staff member to the collection
    addPayClaim(int, double) - Method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.PayrollSystem
    Adds a payClaim for a part-time employee
    addPayslip(Payslip) - Method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.staff.Staff
    used by both employee types to add their payslips, takes a payslip object as a parameter
    addRandomStaffFromDatabase(String, int) - Static method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.stresstest.StaffLoader
    A method to be called by the admin from the cli taking two parameters One being the location of the csv file holding the sample employees The other parameter being the number of random employees the admin would like generated Uses the FileReader imported package to read the data from the csv file Uses the BufferedReader which wraps the FileReader package, and allows more efficient reading from the file Utilizes try catch blocks to prevent a whole system shutdown should an error be detected Uses similar parsing techniques to create the employees and add them to the staffContainer
    addStaff() - Method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.user.Admin
    Adds a new staff member to the payroll system Prompts the admin to enter staff type, name, ID, title, scale point, and password, and then adds the staff member to the system Has some error checking, will not allow a scalePoint higher than the highest scalePoint associated with The employees current title to be input, and if it is it will tell the user the highest scalePoint available
    Admin - Class in com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.user
    Admin class represents an admin user in the payroll system Provides functionality to manage staff such as adding staff members, viewing staff details, and saving staff information to a CSV file
    Admin() - Constructor for class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.user.Admin
     
    annualPromotion() - Method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.system.user.HR
    Performs annual promotions for all full-time employees in the month of October If it's not October, the promotion process will not be initiated.
    authenticate(String) - Method in class com.mycompany.payrollsystem.staff.Staff
    Method to validate an employees password Checks the password entered by the employee against the password assosiated with that employee In a real setting this would likely be encrypted and not stored in plain text but here it's ok I think
